resources.string: Put the Washerwomans TOWNSFOLK reminder token by any Townsfolk character token, and put the Washerwomans WRONG reminder token by any other character token
Wake all minions, show THIS IS THE DEMON card point to the Demon
Wake Demon, show THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS card point to the minions. Show THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY card. show prepared bluffs
Wake the Poisoner. They point at any player. Put the POISONED reminder token by the chosen players character token
Each night, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp
